text: The Girl Next Door is a 2004 American teen sex comedy movie. It is directed by Luke Greenfield. It stars Emile Hirsch, Elisha Cuthbert, Timothy Olyphant, James Remar, Chris Marquette and Paul Dano. It also got mixed reviews from critics with Roger Ebert giving it a 1.5 out of 4 stars. It also holds a 56% rating on Rotten Tomatoes. The movie is about a high school senior, Matthew Kidman (Emile Hirsch), who falls in love for the first time with the girl next door, Danielle (Elisha Cuthbert). However, he finds the situation becoming a problem after he learns that she is a one-time pornographic actress. ==Cast== * Emile Hirsch as Matthew Kidman * Elisha Cuthbert as Danielle / Athena * Timothy Olyphant as Kelly * James Remar as Hugo Posh * Chris Marquette as Eli * Paul Dano as Klitz * Olivia Wilde as Kellie * Sunny Leone as cameo appearance * Amanda Swisten as April * Sung-Hi Lee as Ferrari * Timothy Bottoms as Mr. Kidman * Donna Bullock as Mrs. Kidman * Jacob Young as Hunter * Luther Reigns as Mule ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2000s coming-of-age movies Category:2004 romantic comedy movies Category:2000s teen comedy movies Category:2000s sex comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:American coming-of-age movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:American teen comedy movies Category:American sex comedy movies Category:Coming-of-age comedy movies Category:Coming-of-age romance movies Category:2000s English-language movies Category:Movies about abduction Category:Movies set in California Category:Movies set in Las Vegas Category:Teen sex comedy movies Category:Movies about pornography
title: The Girl Next Door (2004 movie)
